overview: Dana DeArmond: Fed up with her husband's stamina, Dana calls in some much needed reinforcement. Darla Crane: Darla gets interrupted while riding the monster and asks her husband to have a seat until she's done. Phylisha Anne: For her husband's birthday Phylisia decides to shower herself with the ultimate gift. Roxanne Hall: Roxanne left her toy out on the couch. The only problem is her toy is a well hung black man. Zoe Voss: Zoe's husband got a trainer to stretch out his wife but he had no idea what he was in for.
title: Mom's Cuckold 6
